status.description:
The status of the member. Indicates whether the member is
operational.

admin_state_up.description:
The administrative state of the member, which is up ( ``true`` ) or
down ( ``false`` ).

subnet_id.description: Subnet in which to access this member.

tenant_id.description:
The ID of the tenant who owns the member. Only administrative users
can specify a tenant ID other than their own.

address.description: The IP address of the member.

protocol_port.description: The port where the application is hosted.

id.description: The unique ID for the member.
